definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: And, yes, you should create lightweight models of your proposed software designs.
sentences.chinese: 并且，你应该创建软件设计的轻量级模型。

sentences.english: Ultra lightweight and breathable Energy Cloak fabric.
sentences.chinese: 超轻量级和能源雨衣织物透气。

sentences.english: The heavyweight danced around the ring like a lightweight.
sentences.chinese: 重量级选手像轻量级选手一样在拳击场上跳跃。

sentences.english: Spider kelly taught them to box like featherweights .
sentences.chinese: 斯拜德凯利教他们像次轻量级拳击手那样去打拳。

sentences.english: You also learn about some lightweight development tools.
sentences.chinese: 您还将了解一些轻量级开发工具。

sentences.english: The result is a lightweight blade with a large sweet-spot and excellent control.
sentences.chinese: 其结果是一个轻量级的刀片一大甜现场和良好的控制。

sentences.english: The DSAS is compact, lightweight and very portable.
sentences.chinese: DSAS是紧凑，轻量级选手和非常便携式。

sentences.english: A default implementation is provided by GMS for lightweight replicated caching.
sentences.chinese: GMS为轻量级复制缓存提供了一个默认实现。

sentences.english: If your objects are lightweight, this policy will serve you well.
sentences.chinese: 如果对象是轻量级的，这个策略可以很好地工作。

sentences.english: Snippy: Snippy is a light weight snippet compiler integrated into .
sentences.chinese: Snippy是一个轻量级小片编译器集成。

sentences.english: You can well imagine that many people would try to build lightweight containers.
sentences.chinese: 您可以想像得到，许多人都在努力构建轻量级容器。

sentences.english: Nice lightweight lens at only 195 grams 6 elements, recomputed.
sentences.chinese: 轻量级的镜头只有195克，重新设计的6片镜片。

sentences.english: Marvels of micro-engineering, hummingbirds are the bird world's featherweight champions.
sentences.chinese: 微型工程的奇迹，蜂鸟是鸟类世界的轻量级冠军。

sentences.english: Its most powerful attribute is that it is a lightweight protocol.
sentences.chinese: 它最强大的属性是它是一种轻量级协议。

sentences.english: A rapid wave of innovation fuels the lightweight container movement.
sentences.chinese: 革新浪潮引发了轻量级容器运动。

sentences.english: Only a handful of groups are searching for the lightweight particles called axions.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数研究小组正在搜寻叫做轴子的轻量级粒子。

definition: see 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
